channel.title: Client help
channel.description:
I know this is the wrong section, but in my opinion the client is basically a part of the server.
All i want to know is how to change the client backround. I make an amazing backround for my client but i cannot figure out how to apply it. I know where the original backround is in the client but idk what to do with it.
I have teamviewer if you want to help that way.
Thanks!
